host_venue.name: World Equestrian Center — Ocala
host_venue.venue_snap: A wrord, resort-scale equestrian facility with tree-lined promenades, classic white barns, and championship arenas filled with manicured grounds.
host_venue.venue_paragraph: World Equestrian Center — Ocala spans hundreds of acres combining luxury and functionality for competitors and guests. Its grand arenas, elegant stabling, and landscaped promenades create a world-class stage for equestrian sport. Marble finishes, high ceilings, and abundant natural light define the architecture, while the surrounding park-like setting reinforces a sense of calm precision and prestige recognized by riders worldwide.
host_venue.venue_hello: Welcome to World Equestrian Center — Ocala, where elite equestrian sport meets luxury and thoughtful design in the heart of Florida horse country.
